nodes.text: The Tech Citadel was a facility on the planet Coruscant that employed slicers and technicians serving the Galactic Republic. During the Clone Wars, the slicers at the Citadel analyzed the protocol droid TD-54's memory banks at the request of the Jedi Order, and found out that the droid had a complete set of control commands for a battle droid factory on Geonosis, and he formerly belonged to the crime lord Jabba the Hutt.
The Tech Citadel was first mentioned in Twilight of the Republic play set of the non-canonical 2015 video game Disney Infinity 3.0.
